It doesn't matter if the flight hasn't been according to your expectations, every time you fly you earn points because it's not a competition for who comes first, the algorithm Is more complicated than you think.

In any case, if the conditions were favorable and you didn't fly or didn't upload the flight, you will be penalized on the rank. Consistency is a key factor

So tip: Always charge your flight and most importantly fly!
